articles.title: Blood sample study: Virus in US by December 2019 - News 5 Cleveland
articles.description: A new analysis of blood samples from 24,000 Americans taken in early 2020 is the latest and largest study to suggest the coronavirus arrived in the U.S. in December 2019.
